text.__SUMMARY__: Phoma exigua (syn. Ascochyta gossypii) is a fungal plant pathogen. It causes wet weather blight in cotton and it can be treated with systemic copper.
text.Varieties of Phoma exigua:
Phoma exigua var. exigua
Phoma exigua var. heteromorpha
Phoma exigua var. lincola
Phoma exigua var. solanicola
